entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on release build on Android (App ported from Xamarin) when App.xaml contains GridLength #17879
  • TabbedPage does not trigger when reselected current tab #17877
  • Cannot see unicode characters in the title of mini window #17876
  • MAUI ContentPresenter issue when child view uses a embedded ResourceDictionary #17875
  • How to update label inside Shell.FlyoutHeaderTemplate in MAUI .net 7.0 #17873
  • [ANDROID] Font Asset Not Found: java.lang.RuntimeException - OpenSansSemibold #17872
  • App crash with PlatformView cannot be null here #17871
  • [Windows] Content of `Grid` placed inside `ScrollView` is partially visible #17870
  • [Windows] `Grid` layout does not resize correctly #17869
  • [Android] `ImageButton` causes app unresponsiveness #17868
  • Android keyboard native enter / accept / ok button is not submitting values. #17867
  • The `ScrollTo` method from the `CollectionView` class does not reveal groups #17866
  • [Windows] `CollectionView` throws NRE when `ScrollTo` method is called from a handler of event `Window.Created` #17865
  • [Windows] `CollectionView` throws NRE when value of `IsGrouped` property is changed to `false` #17864
  • Android Crashing: "Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to draw too large(109224768bytes) bitmap.'" Runs perfect on iOS/Windows. Any ideas why? #17862
  • Adding a Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged handler throw an exception on Android 14 #17861
  • Maui Preferences always thows exception while using datatype other than string. #17858
  • Image.Source = ImageSource.FromResource() & ImageSource.FromStream() are not reliably integrating back with the MainThread? Causing app breaking threading error? (Android issue only, okay in iOS and Windows) #17857
  • CollectionView still has default spacing between items, despite numerous PRs to fix it #17851

Closed

  • Label with multibinding is not visible in collectionView #17859
  • Only first item in CollectionView is visible if ItemTemplate have multibinding #17856
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] Grid with padding column misalignment #16815
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI Custom Entry on Android, background drawable #17860
    .NET 8 GA
  • [ManualMauiTest][D20+D16] Tab keys do not leave editors #17804

PullRequests

Created

  • Work around the dotnet tool restore issues #17878
  • Reverting default item and globbing updates #17853
  • [net8.0] Reverting default item and globbing updates #17852

Merged

  • Correctly expand rows/columns when grid padding #17750
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    community ✨
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, .NET 8 + Servicing
